lit.,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, c. acc. pers. Ge 20:17 (E), Ps 107:20 (sf.), c. [[ל]] pers. Nu 12:13 (JE) 2Ki 20:5, 2Ki 20:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of men, abs. Ec 3:3 (opp. [[הרג]]); pt. as subst. healer, physician, Ge 50:2, Ge 50:2 (J) 2Ch 16:12.
fig., heal hurts of nation, involving ´[[י]]:’s (restored) favour (and, often, forgiveness):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: subj. ´[[י]]:, c. sf. pers., Ho 6:1, Ho 11:3 (yet cf. We Now), Ex 15:26 (J), Is 19:22 b, Is 57:18, Is 57:19, Je 33:6, Ps 30:3, cf. Ps 6:3; c. acc. [[עַם]] 2Ch 30:20, c. acc. [[אֶרֶץ]] 2Ch 7:14; c. [[ל]] of nation Ho 7:1, and (indef. subj.) Is 6:10 (lest) one heal them (= pass., they be healed); c. acc. of hurt, [[מִחַץ מַכָּתוֹ]] Is 30:26, [[שְׁבָרִים]] (of land) Ps 60:4, so [[סְשׁוּבָה]] Ho 14:5, Je 3:22 (incl. the consequences of backsliding); c. [[ל]] of hurt Ps 103:3; acc. nation (personif.) + [[מִן]] of hurt Je 30:17 I will heal thee of thy wounds (‖[[אֶרְפָּאֵח ]]); abs. Is 19:22 (opp. [[נגף]]), De 32:39 (opp. [[מחץ]]); pt. as subst. healer, physician Je 8:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: human subj., c. [[ל]] of nation, Ho 5:13, cf. La 2:13.

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: fig., heal individ. distresses, c. sf. pers. Je 17:14, c. acc. [[נַפְשִׁי]] = me Je 41:5, c. [[ל]] pers., [[לִשְׁבוּרֵי לֵב]] Ps 147:3 (i.e. longing exiles, cf. Is 61:3); abs. Job 5:18 (opp. [[מחץ]]); pt. as subst. Job 13:4.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִרְפָּא]] Le 13:37 +, 3 fs. [[נִרְפָָּתָה]] (Ges:§ 75 qq) Je 51:9; 3 pl. [[וְנִרְפּאו]] consec. Ez Eze 47:8; Impf. 2 ms. [[תֵּרָפֵא]] Je 51:8; 3 mpl. [[יֵרָֽפְאוּ]] Ez Eze 47:9, Eze 47:11, [[וַיֵּרָפו]] (Ges:l.c.) 2Ki 2:22, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הֵרָפֵא]] Je 15:18 +, [[הֵרָפֵה]] (Id:ib.) Je 19:11;—be healed:

lit., of pers. 1Sa 6:3; + acc. of disease De 28:27, De 28:35; subj. disease Le 13:18, Le 13:37, Le 14:3, Le 14:48; of (bad) water 2Ki 2:22, salt waters (prediction), i.e. be made fresh, Ez Eze 47:8, Eze 47:9, Eze 47:11; of (broken) pottery, i.e. be made whole, Je 19:11 (in sim.).
fig., be healed:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of national hurts, subj. city Je 51:8, Je 51:9; involving forgiveness and ´[[י]]:’s blessing, impers. c. [[ל]] of people, [[נִרְפָּא־לָנוּ]] Is 53:5 i.e. healing has come to us.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of personal distress, subj. pers. Je 17:14, subj. the distress Je 15:18.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[רִפִּאתִי]] 2Ki 2:21; 2 mpl. [[רְפֵּאתֶם]] Ez Eze 34:4; 1 pl. [[רִפִּאנוּ]] Je 51:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְרַפֵּא]] Ex 21:19, Zec 11:16, [[וַיְרַפֵּא]] 1Ki 18:30; 3 mpl. [[וַיְרַפְּאוּ]] Je 6:14, [[וַיְרַפּוּ]] (Ges:§ 75 qq) Je 8:11; Inf. abs. [[רַפּׂא]] Ex 21:19;—have healed, heal, usu. human subj.:
lit., [[רַפּאׂ יְרַפֵּא]] Ex 21:19 he shall have (him) well healed; c. acc. of altar, = repair, 1Ki 18:30; c. [[ל]] of water (subj. ´[[י]]:) 2Ki 2:21.
fig. of healing national defects and hurts, acc. pers., Ez Eze 34:14, Zec 11:16; work at healing, treat (acc. of hurt) Je 6:14, Je 8:11 (both [[עַל־נְקַלָּה]], v. [[[קָלַל]]]

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. of purpose, [[לְהִתְרַפֵּא]], lit., in order to get healed, + [[מִן]] of wounds 2Ki 8:29 = 2Ki 9:15, so ‖ 2Ch 22:6 (rd. with LXX [[מִן]] for [[כִּי]], cf. Be Kau Benz).
